collectible.name: Rick, the scientist - Chronos
collectible.description: Rick the scientist has been a troublesome person for the inhabitants of Chronos. He used to disrupt island parties to lecture on the problems of global warming. He has developed his clean energy equipment, but cannot convince the city to use it. If you need someone to install your solar panel, Rick is the man. Although he was admitted to the asylum, his cognitive abilities are well preserved.
collectible.author: 0xe330dc28b47d73884ad88837aecfee1f49ad7e7b
